programme.title: Backstory
programme.desc: In July 2010, ESPN aired ``The Decision,'' a live primetime special in which LeBron James, the biggest NBA free agent ever, announced he was leaving Cleveland for Miami. The criticism was massive. Don Van Natta Jr. explores the far-reaching impact.(n)

programme.title: E:60
programme.desc: An exclusive look inside Washington QB Alex Smith's recovery from a 2018 leg injury that nearly cost him his life. Smith opens up about battling flesh-eating bacteria, limb salvage measures, and what it was like to finally throw a football again.(n)

programme.title: SC Featured
programme.desc: This special edition is hosted by Elle Duncan and features stories of trailblazing women that include Althea Gibson, Denise Long, Shelly Pennefather, Pratima Sherpa, Katherine Switzer, the Silver Bullets and the Flying Queens.(n)

programme.title: E:60
programme.desc: An interview with Simone Biles; WNBA top draft pick Sabrina Ionescu on her bond with her twin brother; the story of the 2018 Nigerian Olympic bobsled team; a young distance runner with multiple sclerosis; an essay on women in sports by Allison Glock.(n)
